availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John C. Monfort (Henry County, KY, merchant, judge and attorney)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, merchant, judge, and attorney. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Bergen Monfort on October 18, 1850. Father of Caroline Monfort Sparks, Warren Monfort, and Tiney Monfort Claxon. Married to Matilda Monfort. Merchant in Henry County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1850. Judge of the Henry County Court in Henry County from 1858 to 1865. Owned one enslaved person in Henry County in 1860.
